title: Four distinct pathways involved in a "tug-of-war" lead to the non-linear nature of phenolic chemistry during lactic acid fermentation of fruits and vegetables.
abstract: Lactic acid fermentation of fruits and vegetables (F&V) is endowed with new nutrients and flavors. "Phenolics" is a hot spot in this area, which evolve irregularly during fermentation. However, the mechanism about this non-linear phenomenon has been poorly understood.
